Title: The idea is wrong and socially inadequate. The expert spoke about...

Title: Putin signs decree on autumn conscription
Description: Putin signs decree on autumn conscriptionThe Russian president signed a decree to draft 133,000 Russians aged 18-30 from October 1 to December 31. Soldiers whose service has expired are to be dismissed.

Title: Weather in Kyiv set 11 records in September
Description: Weather in Kyiv set 11 records in SeptemberOn September 27-28, three temperature records were set in Kyiv. The minimum temperature did not drop below 17.3°C and 17.5°C, respectively, and the average daily temperature on September 28 was 23.1°C, which is 9.9°C above normal.

Title: Driver dies after car collides with cattle in Lviv region
Description: Driver dies after car collides with cattle in Lviv regionIn Lviv region, a car overturned into a ditch after a collision with cattle. The 47-year-old driver died on the spot, and two passengers were injured. Rescuers unblocked the victims.

Title: A woman falls on the tracks in the Kyiv subway

Title: President of Latvia breaks his arm during a bike ride

Title: Hurricane Helene kills at least 90 people in the United States

Title: Guerrillas sabotage railway lines in Kursk region - ATESH

Title: Medieval necropolis discovered in the mountains on the border of ...

Title: A whole family was poisoned by carbon monoxide in Ivano-Frankivsk

Title: Since the beginning of the year, about 7 thousand residents of th...

Title: Explosions heard in Kyiv, air defense system in operation

Title: A world record is set in China - more than 7.5 thousand drones ha...

Title: Hezbollah elects new leader: what is known

Title: September 30: All-Ukrainian Library Day, International Translatio...
Description: September 30: All-Ukrainian Library Day, International Translation DayOn September 30, Ukraine celebrates the Day of Libraries. The first libraries appeared in Kievan Rus in the 9th and 10th centuries, and today there are about 15,000 library institutions in the country.
